emotions.description: A feeling of great pleasure and happiness
Feeling or showing sorrow or grief
A strong feeling of annoyance, displeasure, or hostility
An unpleasant emotion caused by the belief that someone or something is dangerous
A feeling of mild astonishment or shock caused by something unexpected
Firm belief in the reliability, truth, ability, or strength of someone or something
A feeling of excitement about something that is going to happen
A feeling of revulsion or strong disapproval
An intense feeling of deep affection or attachment
A feeling of having done wrong or failed in an obligation
